TopicTitle: The Avengers S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier in KSP

Articles.Content:
Without doubt the most epic KSP build I've ever done, let's take Nick Fury's own flying aircraft carrier and SHIELD command center for a spin in Kerbal Space Program.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/r8L5lTPBBDU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

(Hey, there's a sub-forum here?)
What mods did you use? Can we have the .cfg?
